p: Satureja thymbra essential oils were prepared as an emulsion (10% w/w) using Tween 80. Sterilization of the obtained emulsion was achieved using a 0.45 μm membrane filter. Agar-well diffusion method was performed according to the Clinical and Laboratory Standards Institute [ 40]. The resultant inhibition zones were measured in mm, and the average values were taken. Ampicillin, Ciprofloxacin and Amphotericin B were used as standard antimicrobial agents. A blank prepared from the same concentration of Tween 80 was included.
